import React, {useState,useContext} from 'react' import '../styles/login.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import registerImg from '../assets/images/register.png' import userIcon from '../assets/images/user.png' const Register = () => { const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ UserName:undefined, email:undefined, password:undefined, }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) //send the dat server }; const handleClick=e=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return (
